401.name: Authentication Denied
401.message: Your session may have expired please re-enter your login credentials

503.name: Service Unavailable
503.message:
Connection to the server is currently unavailable
Either your internet connection is unstable or server is simply unavailable

403.name: Access Denied
403.message:
Your account is not
authorized
to see this information

400.name: Bad Request
login: Username and Password did not match

408.name: Request Timeout
408.message: Server waited too long for a request

Unknown Error.name: Unknown Error
Unknown Error.message: Sorry, but we are currently unable to diagnose the problem, please try again later
